lineHeightReset.comment: Remove extra leading. Unitless line-heights for reusability

borderRadiusCircle.comment: Circle for global use, action icon bgd shape

borderRadiusMedium.comment: Icons in lists, record home icon, unbound input elements

spacingXLarge.comment: Constant spacing token for size X Large

spacingXxLarge.comment: Constant spacing token for size XX Large

fontWeightBold.comment: Used sparingly for emphasized text within regular body copy.

spacingLarge.comment: Constant spacing token for size Large

avatarGroupColorBackgroundInverse.comment: Dark gray avatar group background color.

colorBackgroundButtonInverseDisabled.comment: Disabled button backgrounds on inverse/dark backgrounds

colorBackgroundButtonIconDisabled.comment: Background color for icon-only button - disabled state

colorBackgroundButtonIconFocus.comment: Background color for icon-only button - focus state

colorBackgroundButtonInverseActive.comment: Active button backgrounds on inverse backgrounds on mobile

colorBackgroundButtonIconHover.comment: Background color for icon-only button - hover state

colorBackgroundButtonIconActive.comment: Background color for icon-only button - active state

cardSpacingMargin.comment: Use for vertical spacing between cards

carouselIndicatorColorBackground.comment: Default background for carousel navigation indicators

carouselIndicatorColorBackgroundHover.comment: Default hover background for carousel navigation indicators

carouselIndicatorColorBackgroundFocus.comment: Default focus background for carousel navigation indicators

carouselIndicatorColorBackgroundActive.comment: Default background for active state on carousel navigation indicators

chatMessageColorBackgroundOutboundAgent.comment: Outbound agent chat message background color.

tableColorBackgroundStripes.comment: Alternating row background color for tables

tableColorBackgroundHeader.comment: Default background color for table headers

tableColorBackgroundHeaderHover.comment: Hover state for table header cells

tableColorBackgroundHeaderFocus.comment: Focused state for table header cells

colorBackgroundDockedPanel.comment: Docked panel’s background color when open.

utilityBarColorBackgroundNotificationBad.comment: Utility bar notifications badge background color.

utilityBarColorBackgroundNotificationFoc.comment: Utility bar notifications focus background color.

colorBackgroundIconWaffle.comment: Default color for animated icon waffle for app switcher.

typingIconDotColorBackgroundGray.comment: Default background color for a typing icon dot.

typingIconDotColorBackgroundGrayDark.comment: Active background color for a typing icon dot when animcating.

einsteinHeaderTextShadow.comment: Text shadow color for Einstein header background to make text more readable

colorBackgroundContextBarItemHover.comment: Hovered context bar item background color.

colorBackgroundContextBarItemActive.comment: Active context bar item background color.

colorBackgroundContextTabBarItem.comment: Context TAB bar item background color.

colorBackgroundContextBarInverseItemHove.comment: Hovered context bar item background color.

colorBackgroundContextBarShadow.comment: A Gradient used for putting shadows on the bottom when box-shadow is not possible.

colorBackgroundContextBarInverseItemActi.comment: Active context bar item background color.

colorBackgroundContextBarBrandAccent.comment: Brand color in context bar for default theme

colorBackgroundContextBarActionHighlight.comment: Highlight for context bar action (hover and focus states).

colorBorderContextBarInverseItem.comment: Border color in context bar on dark background

colorBorderContextBarThemeDefault.comment: Border color in context bar for default theme

colorBorderContextBarThemeDefaultAlt.comment: Alternate border color in context bar for default theme

colorBorderContextBarThemeDefaultHover.comment: Hovered border color in context bar for default theme

colorBorderContextBarThemeDefaultActive.comment: Active border color in context bar for default theme

globalnavigationItemHeightAccentActive.comment: Context bar tab accent height when tab is active.

globalnavigationItemHeightAccentFocus.comment: Context bar tab accent height when tab is focused.

colorTextContextBarInverse.comment: Context bar text color on a dark background

colorTextContextBarActionTrigger.comment: Context bar action trigger text color

panelDockedLeftShadow.comment: Dropshadow found on docked UI panels when positioned to the left of a viewport

panelDockedRightShadow.comment: Dropshadow found on docked UI panels when positioned to the left of a viewport

colorBackgroundPathIncompleteHover.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.

colorBackgroundPathStepActionActive.comment: The background color for the step action arrow that are the active stage

colorBackgroundPathIncomplete.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.

colorBackgroundPathActiveHover.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are the active stage.

colorBackgroundPathLost.comment: The background color for the final stage of a Salespath when it has been lost.

colorBackgroundPathActive.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are the active stage.

colorBackgroundGuidance.comment: The background color for Salespath guidance coaching section.

colorBackgroundPathWon.comment: The background color for the final stage of a Salespath when it has been lost.

colorBackgroundPathCurrentHover.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.

colorBackgroundPathCurrent.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.

colorBackgroundPathCompleteHover.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are complete.

colorBackgroundPathComplete.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are complete.

colorBackgroundPathStepActionCurrent.comment: The background color for the step action arrow that are the current stage

colorBackgroundPathExpanded.comment: The background color for the overall Salespath coaching section.

colorBorderPathDivider.comment: Used as a separator between dark colors like the stages of salespath.

colorBorderPathCurrent.comment: Used as a border color for the active Path step.

colorBorderPathCurrentHover.comment: Used as a border color for the current path step on hover.

pathButtonWidthFixed.comment: Width of action button to right

widthPathBorderCurrent.comment: Border width of current stage for path item

colorTextPathCurrent.comment: Used as a text color for the active Path step.

colorTextPathCurrentHover.comment: Used as a text hover color for the active Path step.

popoverWalkthroughColorBackground.comment: The default background color for Popover Walkthrough

colorBorderInputCheckboxSelectedCheckmar.comment: The borders to create the checkmark

colorBorderButtonInverseDisabled.comment: Border color for disabled inverse button.

colorBorderIconInverseHintHover.comment: Hovered border color for a button with an icon that has a parent element that has a hover state

colorBorderErrorDark.comment: Dark alternative border color for UI elements related to errors.

colorBorderIconInverseHint.comment: Border color for a button with an icon that has a parent element that has a hover state

colorBorderBrandDark.comment: Our product brand blue, darkened to meet accessibility color contrast ratios with white text.

colorBorderInfo.comment: Border color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).

colorBorderWarning.comment: Border color for UI elements that have to do with warnings.

colorBorderTabActive.comment: Border color for an active tab.

colorBorderDestructiveHover.comment: Hover border color for UI elements that have to do with destructive actions.

colorBorder.comment: Default border color for UI elements.

colorBorderInputDisabled.comment: Border color on disabled form elements.

colorBorderSuccessDark.comment: Dark alternative border color for UI elements that have to do with success.

colorBorderButtonBrandDisabled.comment: Border color for brandable primary button - disabled state

colorBorderDestructive.comment: Border color for UI elements that have to do with destructive actions.

colorBorderButtonDefault.comment: Border color for default secondary button

colorBorderSeparatorAlt2.comment: Darkest separator color - used as an alternate separator color when more differentiation is desired.

colorBorderOffline.comment: Border color for UI elements related to the offline state.

colorBorderSuccess.comment: Border color for UI elements that have to do with success.

colorBorderSeparator.comment: Lightest separator color - used as default separator on white backgrounds.

colorBorderSelectionActive.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being clicked. Specific to builders.

colorBorderButtonBrand.comment: Border color for brandable primary button

colorBorderError.comment: Border color for UI elements that have to do with errors.

colorBorderSelectionHover.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being hovered over. Specific to builders.

colorBorderInputActive.comment: Border color on active form elements.

colorBorderToggleChecked.comment: These borders create the faux checkmark when the checkbox toggle is in the checked state.

colorBorderRowSelectedHover.comment: Used as the border color for the hover state on selected rows or items on list-like components.

colorBorderCustomer.comment: Border color for UI elements related to the concept of an external user or customer.

colorBorderSelection.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a selected component. Specific to builders.

colorBorderCanvasElementSelectionHover.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a selected canvas element that is being hovered over. Specific to builders.

colorBorderRowSelected.comment: Used as the border color for selected rows or items on list-like components.

colorBorderSeparatorAlt.comment: Medium separator color - used as default separator on light gray backgrounds.

colorBorderCanvasElementSelection.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a selected canvas element. Specific to builders.

colorBorderInverse.comment: Border color to match UI elements using color-background-inverse.

colorStrokeHeaderButton.comment: Stroke color for our global header buttons.

colorBorderDestructiveActive.comment: Active border color for UI elements that have to do with destructive actions.

colorBorderErrorAlt.comment: Alternative border color for UI elements related to errors.

colorBorderTabSelected.comment: Border color for a selected tab in a tab group.

colorBorderHint.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a specific region. Specific to builders.

colorBorderSeparatorInverse.comment: Used as a separator on dark backgrounds, such as stage left navigation.

colorBackgroundRowActive.comment: Used as the background color for the active state on rows or items on list-like components.

colorBackgroundNotification.comment: Background color for notification list item.

colorBackgroundNotificationNew.comment: Background color for a new notification list item.

colorBackgroundRowHover.comment: Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.

colorBackgroundErrorDark.comment: Dark color for UI elements related to errors. Accessible with white text.

colorBackgroundInfo.comment: Background color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).

colorBackgroundTempModalTint.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.

colorBackgroundReminderHover.comment: Background color for reminder notification on hover

colorBackgroundAltInverse.comment: Alternative background color for dark portions of the app.

colorBackgroundRowNew.comment: Used as the background color for the new state on rows or items on list-like components.

colorBackgroundSuccessDark.comment: Dark color for UI elements that have to do with success. Accessible with white text.

colorBackgroundStencil.comment: Used as background for loading stencils on white background.

colorBackgroundAlt2.comment: Used when further differentiation is needed because colorBackground and colorBackgroundAlt are both being used in close proximity.

colorBackgroundWarning.comment: Color for UI elements that have to do with warning.

colorBackgroundButtonSuccessHover.comment: Hovered background color for success buttons

colorBackgroundUtilityBarHover.comment: Hover color for utility bar item.

colorBackgroundHighlightSearch.comment: Background color for highlighting text in search results.

colorBackgroundDestructiveHover.comment: Hover color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

colorBackground.comment: Default background color for the whole app.

colorBrandDark.comment: Our product brand blue, darkened to meet accessibility color contrast ratios with white text.

colorBackgroundBackdrop.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.

colorBackgroundChromeDesktop.comment: Background color for default desktop chrome (ex. global header)

colorBackgroundModalButtonActive.comment: Active button backgrounds on modal headers

colorBackgroundDestructive.comment: Color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

colorBackgroundTempModalTintAlt.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.

colorBackgroundSuccess.comment: Color for UI elements that have to do with success.

colorBackgroundOffline.comment: Color for UI elements related to the offline state.

colorBackgroundBackdropTint.comment: The color of the mask overlay that provides user feedback on interaction.

colorBackgroundInputActive.comment: Selected input field (when user has clicked or tabbed into field)

colorBackgroundStencilAlt.comment: Used as an alternate background for loading stencils on gray backgrounds.

colorBackgroundScrollbar.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar.

colorBackgroundChromeMobile.comment: Background color for default mobile chrome (ex. global header)

colorBackgroundInputSearch.comment: Background color for search input fields.

colorBackgroundCustomer.comment: Background color for UI elements related to the concept of an external user or customer.

colorBackgroundError.comment: Color for UI elements related to errors.

colorBackgroundBrowser.comment: Secondary top bar background color (child browser, file preview, etc.)

colorBackgroundAlt.comment: Second default background color for the app.

colorBackgroundPost.comment: Background color of comment posts in the feed.

colorBackgroundRowSelected.comment: Used as the background color for selected rows or items on list-like components.

colorBackgroundToastSuccess.comment: Background color for success toast messaging.

colorBackgroundImageOverlay.comment: Color of mask overlay that sits on top of an image when text is present.

colorBrandDarker.comment: Our product brand blue, darkened even further.

colorBackgroundTempModal.comment: Used as the default background color for temporary dialog elements, such as the progress spinner background.

colorBackgroundSelection.comment: Background color for text selected with a mouse.

colorBackgroundShade.comment: Used as gray background when more contrast is desired.

colorBackgroundDestructiveActive.comment: Active color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

colorBackgroundPayload.comment: Background color for payloads in the feed.

colorBackgroundUtilityBarActive.comment: Active color for utility bar item.

colorBackgroundButtonSuccessActive.comment: Active background color for success buttons

colorBackgroundToastError.comment: Background color for error toast messaging.

colorBackgroundOrgSwitcherArrow.comment: Stage left org switcher dropdown arrow background color.

colorBackgroundInverse.comment: Default background color for dark portions of the app (like Stage Left or tooltips).

colorBackgroundErrorAlt.comment: Alternative color for UI elements related to errors.

pageColorBackgroundPrimary.comment: Winter 18 token, this has been deprecated. Please use BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY instead.

colorBackgroundShadeDark.comment: Used as gray background in conjunction with Shade when more contrast is desired.

colorBackgroundActionbarIconUtility.comment: Background for utility icons that live in the action bar on mobile.

colorBackgroundScrollbarTrack.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar track.

colorBackgroundInputError.comment: Background color for input field that has encountered an error.

colorBackgroundHighlight.comment: Background color for highlighting UI elements.

shadowLinkFocusInverse.comment: Custom glow for focus states on UI link elements with explicit containers on dark or vibrantly colored backgrounds.

shadowButtonFocus.comment: Custom glow for focus states on UI elements with explicit containers.

shadowSoftPrimary.comment: Soft dropshadow found on general UI elements such as containers

shadowHardPrimary.comment: Hard dropshadow found on general UI elements such as containers

shadowActionOverflowFooter.comment: Shadow above overflow menu close bar.

shadowReminder.comment: Shadow for notifications that should be elevated above other components but under modals.

shadowDocked.comment: Shadow on elements that are docked to the bottom of the viewport.

shadowInlineEdit.comment: Shadow to make inline edit card pop out.

shadowButtonFocusInverse.comment: Custom glow for focus states on UI button elements with explicit containers on dark or vibrantly colored backgrounds.

colorTextButtonInverseDisabled.comment: Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextIconInverseHintHover.comment: Hovered icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state

colorTextLinkInverseActive.comment: Link color on dark background - active state

colorTextIconInverseActive.comment: Icon color on dark background - active state

colorTextTabLabelSelected.comment: Color for text on a selected tab in a tab group.

colorTextWarning.comment: Color for texts or icons that are related to warnings on a dark background.

colorTextIconInverseHint.comment: Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state on a dark background. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextTabLabelDisabled.comment: Color for disabled text in a tab group.

colorTextButtonDefaultHover.comment: Text color for default secondary button - hover state

colorTextDestructiveHover.comment: Text color for destructive actions - hover state

colorTextButtonDefault.comment: Text color for default secondary button

colorTextInverseActive.comment: Active state on a standalone link on a dark background.

colorTextButtonBrandDisabled.comment: Text color for brandable primary button - disabled state

colorTextButtonBrandHover.comment: Text color for brandable primary button - hover state

colorTextTabLabelFocus.comment: Color for text in focus state in a tab group.

colorTextWeak.comment: Color for text that is purposefully de-emphasized to create visual hierarchy.

colorTextPlaceholderInverse.comment: Input placeholder text on dark backgrounds.

colorTextIconDefaultHintBorderless.comment: Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextWarningAlt.comment: Color for texts that are related to warnings on a light background.

colorTextButtonBrand.comment: Text color for brandable primary button

colorTextTabLabelActive.comment: Color for text in active state in a tab group.

colorTextTabLabelHover.comment: Color for text in hover state in a tab group.

colorTextButtonDefaultDisabled.comment: Text color for default secondary button - disabled state

colorTextToast.comment: Color for text on toast messages.

colorTextError.comment: Error text for inputs and error misc

colorTextTabLabel.comment: Color for default text in a tab group.

colorTextCustomer.comment: Customer text used in anchor subtitle

colorTextBrandPrimary.comment: Text color found on any primary brand color

colorTextIconDefaultHint.comment: Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextButtonBrandActive.comment: Text color for brandable primary button - active state

colorTextIconBrand.comment: Color for non-interactive icons that represent a selected item in a list

colorTextInverseHover.comment: Hover state on a standalone link on a dark background.

colorTextButtonInverse.comment: Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextLinkInverseDisabled.comment: Link color on dark background - disabled state

colorTextInverse.comment: Inverse text color for dark backgrounds

colorTextButtonDefaultActive.comment: Text color for default secondary button - active state

colorTextIconInverseDisabled.comment: Icon color on dark background - disabled state

colorTextButtonDefaultHint.comment: Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.

colorTextIconInverseHover.comment: Icon color on dark background - hover state

colorTextInverseWeak.comment: Weak inverse text color for dark backgrounds

colorTextLinkInverseHover.comment: Link color on dark background - hover state

colorTextSuccessInverse.comment: Text color for success text on dark backgrounds.

brandBackgroundDarkTransparent.comment: These RGBA values need to be updated if BRAND_BACKGROUND_DARK changes, solves webkit bug

brandHeader.comment: Background color a branded app header

brandHeaderContrastWarm.comment: Variant of BRAND_HEADER_CONTRAST that provides a warm color

brandHeaderContrastCool.comment: Variant of BRAND_HEADER_CONTRAST that provides a cool color

brandHeaderContrastInverse.comment: Variant of BRAND_HEADER that is accessible with BRAND_HEADER

brandDark.comment: Dark variant of BRAND that is accessible with light colors

brandAccessible.comment: Dark variant of BRAND that is accessible with white

brandBackgroundDark.comment: Dark variant of BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY, used within gradient of background color

brandHeaderIcon.comment: Icons of BRAND_HEADER that is accessible with BRAND_HEADER

brandContrast.comment: Variant of BRAND that is accessible with BRAND

brandHeaderContrastWeak.comment: Weak contrast ratio, useful for iconography

brandBackgroundPrimaryTransparent.comment: These RGBA values need to be updated if BRAND_BACKGROUND_PRIMARY changes, solves webkit bug

brandHeaderContrast.comment: Variant of BRAND_HEADER that is accessible with BRAND_HEADER

brandLight.comment: Light variant of BRAND that is accessible with dark colors

mqMediumLandscape.comment: Medium form factor, landscape:  devices larger than phone, in landscape orientation

mqHighRes.value: only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), screen and (min-device-pixel-ratio: 2),screen and (min-resolution: 192dpi),screen and (min-resolution: 2dppx)

mqSingleColumnRecordLayout.comment: Make record layout 1 col when its view port is < 600px

widthStageLeftCollapsed.comment: Stage left for desktop when closed (showing icons only).

widthStageLeftExpanded.comment: Stage left for desktop when open.

colorBackgroundWarningDark.comment: Dark Color for UI elements that have to do with warning.

colorBackgroundSuccessDarker.comment: Darker color for UI elements that have to do with success. Accessible with white text.

maxWidthActionOverflowMenu.comment: Maximum width for action overflow menu so that it's not full-screen for tablet.

maxWidthHeaderBrand.comment: Maximum width for brand logos in header.

maxHeightCardMedia.comment: Maximum height for photos and such in cards.

maxHeightHeaderBrand.comment: Maximum height for brand logos in header.

maxWidthActionBarWithLabels.comment: Maximum width for action icons in action bar when there are only 2 items with labels.

heightOverflowStart.comment: Space above overflow menu before scrolling.

colorStrokeBrandActive.comment: Active stroke color for our product brand blue.

colorStrokeBrandHover.comment: Hover stroke color for our product brand blue.
